post.message:
Hey y'all! I'm just an intern at here at Connect, but we're coming out with an entirely new product and we're hiring a Senior Product Designer to help make that happen. Given this is 15+ person team, you'll get to make a super big impact. <3 

Top Reasons People come to (and stay at) Connect
#1. The team and mission 
#2. The roof deck at sunset
#3. All the reasons you join a SF start up. We have hella snacks and food, bruh. 
#4. It's super LIT  

We’re still shining up our website and materials -- but as always, the best way to know our team is to meet us. You can read more about the role here: https://jobs.lever.co/connect/5c4e2ae5-ad3f-448e-8416-f6333fd7cb23

P.S. We love to thank friends for referrals! And they generally like it too. Sharing this post would be a big help!

link.caption: jobs.lever.co
link.description: About Us Connect is on a mission to make ‘social’ tech mean face to face -- rather than face to phone. It’s crazy how much time and attention we’re spending staring into screens, when our technology could just as easily be helping us get out there in the real world -- doing the things we love, with…

comments.message: Hey there, Job posts aren't allowed in this group. Please migrate this post to HH Job Listings
